#summary How to build the module from source
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy

= Build Steps =

== Build the module ==
Just run the setup.py with install or build command

{{{
setup.py install
}}}

== Build the distribution ==
Just run the setup.py with bdist or bdist_wininst command

{{{
setup.py bdist_wininst
}}}

= Third Party Library =

== Python ==
As the runtime and libraries, download and install [http://www.python.org/download/ Python 2.5] or later first.

{{{
copy %PYTHON_HOME%\include\* %PYV8_HOME%\lib\python\inc
copy %PYTHON_HOME%\libs\ Python25.lib %PYV8_HOME%\lib\python\lib
}}}

== Boost ==
PyV8 use [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/release/libs/python/doc/ boost::python] for interoperability, so, [http://www.boost.org/users/download/ download] the latest boost version and [http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/release/more/getting_started/ build] the library.

{{{
xcopy /s %BOOST_HOME%\boost %PYV8_HOME%\lib\boost\inc\
copy %BOOST_HOME%\stage\lib\libboost_python*.lib %PYV8_HOME%\lib\boost\lib
}}}

== Google V8 ==
Follow the [http://code.google.com/apis/v8/build.html document] to download and build v8 engine

{{{
copy %V8_HOME%\include\* %PYV8_HOME%\lib\v8\inc\
copy %V8_HOME%\lib\v8*.lib %PYV8_HOME%\lib\v8\lib\
}}}
